```{r echo = FALSE}

sliderInput("slide", "Year", min = 2010, max = 2019, value = 2014, sep = "")   
```



```{r echo  = FALSE}
data <- reactive({
  read.csv("data/ncses_stw/dataForInteractiveDoc/statebinsData.csv")
})
```


```{r echo = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
bin <- reactive({
  viz_data <- data() %>% filter(year == input$slide)
})
```



```{r echo=FALSE} 
renderPlot({
  library(statebins)
  library(ggplot2) 

  statebins(bin(), state_col = "state", value_col = "per_diff", palette = "Blues", direction = 1, round = TRUE, name = "Percent Difference") + theme_statebins() +
  labs(title = "Percent Difference Between JOLTS and BGT Estimates by State")
})
